topic.title: What are the pseudonyms of Zeronet's creators ?
topic.body:
I want to thank them of having invented this decentralized network - with ZeroMail, of course. Furthermore, it is open-source and anonymous (completely with Tor). I know it since its beginning. I really like it very much. I would like to contribute to their projetc when I will learn Python. In future, I have a lots of Web project for Zeronet such as a Diaspora*-like version to its manner, another type of decentralized network - but social, this time.

Well cordially and thank you people for having read it.

You can contact me to: alexandre@zeroid.bit

Alexandre, a french Zeronet's user. 
:-)

topic.title: Save the Internet
topic.body:
« European Regulators are about to decide whether to give big telecoms corporations the power to influence what we can (and can’t) do online. Europe urgently needs clear net neutrality guidelines to protect our freedoms and rights online. We have until July to help Europe protect the open Internet. »
Please, take action with the following website: https://savetheinternet.eu
Concerning me, I'm gonna do that right now. Zeronet's future depends of your action against this injustice.

1_1674XymFPbmAXh78xEpt3Pehtko6i2kvtA.body: Thank you for your answers, guys. :-)

I am really impressed that there is one developer for Zeronet.
He made himself the work of a whole team. :-o
Anyway, he is a developer bright.👍

> [pycole](#comment_52_1KwTTgPRSTHFmmJAFBt6kQfdyNeSM5KJuH): If you look at the pull requests, nofish has done most of the coding, with a bit of help from various others.

Even more impressive. Congratulations to his creative genious - and to the others too !

10_1MEWJRMLgvofqG9Mbsb2Rc4hFFyv7HeRx7.body: Yes, it can be - but not by a web proxy.

2_13t2ME4cTtkxrwPeugeZgdJF5Kg7C5CSEy.body: I think it is the possibility of downloading its tools from its softwares repositories to other GNU/Linux distributions.

9_12i4LiZ39NxcYtsf36aTWJzcpzw4KFUCJy.body:
Hi,
What I LOVE about HIM ?!
Well... NOTHING !

Friendly, Alexandre.
